definition: offspring/future generations/younger generation of a family/junior members of a group
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
lifetime/generation/group of people/class/classifier for generations/(literary) classifier for people

sentences.english: The paper money is for the deceased to use in the afterlife.
sentences.chinese: 這句話不對吧燒紙錢怎麼是給他們下輩子用呢？

sentences.english: If I still remember you in my next life, I will die without you.
sentences.chinese: 下輩子如果我還記得你，我死都不和你在一起。

sentences.english: My next life I want your heart, at least I do not jump you have to die.
sentences.chinese: 繆下輩子我要做你的心臟，至少我不跳你就得死。

sentences.english: Next life I want to be your heart, at least I don't jump you have to die.
sentences.chinese: 下輩子我要做你的心臟，至少我不跳你就得死。

sentences.english: If there is reincarnation life, my next life, I would like to be a swan.
sentences.chinese: 如果生命真有輪迴，下輩子，我願是一隻天鵝。

sentences.english: If I win the lottery, I will be set up for life.
sentences.chinese: 假設我中彩票了，我下輩子就衣食無憂了。

sentences.english: He never paid attention to the younger generation, and never helped us with our studies.
sentences.chinese: 他從來不關下輩的事，也不幫我們學習。

sentences.english: The next generation is only comforts to own one kind.
sentences.chinese: 下輩子只是自己對自己的一種寬慰罷了。

sentences.english: If you can not be with you in this life, next life could marry you?
sentences.chinese: 如果這輩子不能和你在一起，下輩子可以嫁給你嗎？

sentences.english: I want to be your heart, I don't jump, you will die.
sentences.chinese: 下輩子我要做你的心臟，我不跳，你就必死無疑。

sentences.english: My love , I want to be your lover in the next life , too .
sentences.chinese: 親愛的，希望下輩子我也當你的愛人。

sentences.english: Only if you are Chris next life, I will still be a corn.
sentences.chinese: 只要你下輩子還是李宇春，那我還是玉米。

sentences.english: If you can, the next gerneration I still love you.
sentences.chinese: 如果你能，下輩子我依然愛你。

sentences.english: You want to come back as a coffee mug in your next life.
sentences.chinese: 你希望自己下輩子是一個咖啡杯。
